short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides vital statistics about the system hardware, including CPU, RAM, and Network interfaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides detailed vital statistics about the system hardware. 

Displays information about network interfaces, such as network IP of local device, and network interface identifiers. 

Shows exact model and clock rate of CPU, as well as architecture, number of cores, and CPU features.

Displays total RAM installed, as well as up-to-the-second memory usage statistics.

Does all this while weighing in at just 10 KB! And with a minimal memory footprint.
